title: Here are the tech stocks you should invest in to avoid US-China trade exposure
text: Kim Forrest, Boka Capital Partners CIO, and Mark Mahaney, RBC Capital Markets managing director, join 'The Exchange' to discuss where to invest amid trade talk tension.

title: Facebook rolls back ban on cryptocurrency ads as it ramps up its own blockchain efforts
text: Facebook is loosening its ban on ads related to blockchain and cryptocurrency as it reportedly ramps up its own efforts with those technologies.

title: Despite Facebook's struggles, one important contingent remains loyal
text: Facebook shares have whipsawed in the past year, falling from close to $220 last summer to a low around $125 in early 2019 before climbing back to near-$190.

title: Facebook Management Talks Stories, Payments, and Guidance
text: Don't miss these must-see quotes from the social network's latest earnings call.

title: Facebook Picks London as WhatsApp Mobile Payments Hub
text: Faceook Inc. has chosen London as the center of a planned expansion of payments on its WhatsApp mobile-messaging app. Bloomberg's Julie Verhage and Kurt Wagner have more on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: Facebook Stock Can Set a New Record Next Year
text: Facebook clearly is trying to de-emphasize the core of its business, but whether that's good news for FB stock remains to be seen.

title: Facebook chooses London as base to develop WhatsApp's mobile payments service
text: WhatsApp will ramp up hiring, taking on 100 new software engineers for its payments platform.

title: A Guide to Investigations and Penalties Facing Facebook
text: Shares of the social media leader are up sharply in 2019, but the company is still dogged by various investigations that may trigger huge penalties.
